GB: gigabytes (in base 10, for example 1 gigabyte consists of 1000 megabytes)
GiB: gibibytes (in base 2, for example 1 gibibyte consists of 1024 mebibytes)
hugepages: number of pages in memory that are larger than the default page size
KB: kilobytes (in base 10, for example 1 kilobyte consists of 1000 bytes)
KiB: kibibytes (in base 2, for example 1 kibibyte consists of 1024 bytes)
MB/s: megabytes (in base 10, for example 1 megabyte consists of 1000 kilobytes) per second
processes and threads: number of CPU processes and threads
utilization: describes a unitless value indicating the extent to which a device is utilized
